Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, interior slightly grooved and spotted with an off-white granular deposit, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with very faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393151) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393151)
